dialogue.line: What a nice guy that Dave is for inviting us to this farm for a picnic.
I say this makes up for him almost killing us with that whole 3D thing.
I sure do hope no midget farmer with one short of a temper stumbles apon us!
Especially one with the presumption that we were stealing their corn...
Hey! Are you trying to steal my corn?
I GONNA BLOCK YOU OUT OF MY FARM! You never coming back ever again you dirty ole' rodeo trash.
Just get on with it boyfriend.
